body:
lcur_Example CURSOR FOR
		SELECT	COLUMN_EXAMPLE
		FROM	TABLE_NAME
		WHERE	CONDITION_1		= CONDITION_OTHER;

FOR lrec_ReservePartner IN (
		SELECT	*
		FROM	TABLE_NAME
		WHERE	CONDITION_1	= CONDITION_1
		AND		CONDITION_2	= CONDITION_2
		ORDER BY COLUM_NAME
	) LOOP

IF ($1) THEN
	ELSIF
	ELSE
	END IF;

body: ls_ColumnName	:=	CASE WHEN lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN1_FLAG = '9'		THEN 'COLUMN1'		|| C_ARRAY_DELIMITER ELSE '' END ||
CASE WHEN lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN2_FLAG = '9'		THEN 'COLUMN2'		|| C_ARRAY_DELIMITER ELSE '' END ||
CASE WHEN lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN3_FLAG = '9'		THEN 'COLUMN3'		|| C_ARRAY_DELIMITER ELSE '' END;
ORDER BY COLUMNDATA.COLUMN1, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN2, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN3, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN7, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN8, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN9, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN5;
GROUP BY COLUMNDATA.COLUMN1, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN2, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN3, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN7, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN8, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN9, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN11;
GROUP BY COLUMNDATA.COLUMN1, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN2, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN3, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN7, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN8, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN9, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN11;

ls_ColumnName	:=	CASE WHEN (lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN1_FLAG = '9') THEN 'COLUMN1'		|| C_ARRAY_DELIMITER ELSE '' END ||

CASE WHEN (lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN19_FLAG = '9') THEN 'COLUMN19'	|| C_ARRAY_DELIMITER ELSE '' END;
IF (INSTR(ls_ErrorCheck, '10000') > 0 OR INSTR(ls_ErrorCheck, '10010') > 0 AND lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN2 IS NOT NULL) THEN
ls_SkuClass := SUBSTR(lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN11, LENGTH(lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN11) - CAST(ls_Config_ItemClass_Length AS INTEGER) + 1, CAST(ls_Config_ItemClass_Length AS INTEGER));
IF(ls_IncludeFlag <> '0' AND (lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN13 IS NULL OR lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN14 IS NULL) ) THEN
IF (INSTR(ls_ErrorCheck, '60012') > 0 AND ls_SuppliesType IS NOT NULL AND ls_SuppliesType <> '0' AND ls_ConsignItemType IS NOT NULL AND ls_ConsignItemType = '1') THEN
ELSIF (INSTR(ls_ErrorCheck, '60006') > 0 AND ls_SuppliesType IS NOT NULL AND ls_SuppliesType <> '0') THEN
ELSIF (INSTR(ls_ErrorCheck, '60010') > 0 AND ls_ConsignItemType IS NOT NULL AND ls_ConsignItemType = '1') THEN
IF (INSTR(ls_ErrorCheck, '60007') > 0 AND ls_SuppliesType IS NOT NULL AND ls_SuppliesType = '0') THEN
IF (INSTR(ls_ErrorCheck, '60011') > 0 AND ls_ConsignItemType IS NOT NULL AND ls_ConsignItemType <> '1' AND ls_PartnerType IS NOT NULL AND ls_PartnerType <> '12') THEN
IF (INSTR(ls_ErrorCheck, '60013') > 0 AND lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN13 IS NOT NULL) THEN
IF (INSTR(ls_ErrorCheck, '60014') > 0 AND lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN13 IS NULL) THEN
IF (lb_SkuError = FALSE AND (INSTR(ls_ErrorCheck, '10001') > 0 OR INSTR(ls_ErrorCheck, '10011') > 0)) THEN
IF ((lb_SkuError = FALSE AND lb_StoreError = FALSE) AND (INSTR(ls_ErrorCheck, '10002') > 0 OR INSTR(ls_ErrorCheck, '10012') > 0) AND ls_IncludeFlag <> '1') THEN
IF (lb_SkuError = FALSE AND (INSTR(ls_ErrorCheck, '10006') > 0 OR INSTR(ls_ErrorCheck, '10007') > 0)) THEN
IF (lb_StoreError = FALSE AND lb_PartnerError = FALSE) THEN
IF (lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN5 IS NOT NULL AND lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN5 <> '000000') THEN
AND		(	(lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN7 = '1' AND DENPKIND IN ('10', '11') AND DENPTYPE NOT IN ('71', '81', '16', '14'))
OR	(lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN7 = '4' AND DENPKIND IN ('10', '11') AND DENPTYPE = '14')
OR	(lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN7 = '5' AND DENPKIND IN ('10', '11') AND DENPTYPE = '81')
OR	(lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN7 = '6' AND DENPKIND IN ('10', '11') AND DENPTYPE = '16')
IF (ls_EOSType = '1' AND (lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN7 = '1' OR lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN7 = '3') AND lb_ExistsOrder) THEN
AND		HEADER.DENPNO										= CAST(COALESCE(COLUMNDATA.COLUMN10, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN8) AS NUMERIC)
IF (ls_EOSType = '1' AND lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN5 IS NOT NULL) THEN
IF ((ls_DenpKind = '10' OR ls_DenpKind = '14') AND lrec_OrderHeader.LOGISTICSCENTER_CD <> lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN5) THEN
IF (ls_EOSType = '1' AND lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN7 = '2' AND lb_ExistsReturn) THEN
AND		HEADER.DENPNO										= CAST(COALESCE(COLUMNDATA.COLUMN10, COLUMNDATA.COLUMN8) AS NUMERIC)
IF (ls_EOSType = '1' AND lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN5 IS NOT NULL) THEN
IF (ls_DenpKind = '10' AND lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN13 IS NULL AND lrec_OrderHeader.DELIVERYPLANFLAG = '1') THEN
ELSIF (lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN13 IS NULL AND ln_CountCostRate > 0) THEN
CASE WHEN lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN17 = '1' THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END,
IF (lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN14 IS NOT NULL AND lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN14 <> '') THEN
IF (lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN18 IS NOT NULL AND o_PurchaseGnkBik.WHOLESALEGNKINPUTTYPE = '0') THEN
IF (ls_EOSType <> '1' AND lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN5 IS NULL) THEN

FROM	PXC_EA25_001.f_GetLogisticscenter_Cd(lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN2, lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN3, lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN7, lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN1) AS LOGISTICSCENTER_CD;
IF (NOT FOUND OR ls_LogisticsCenterCheck IS NULL) THEN
GROUP BY TMP.COLUMN1, TMP.COLUMN2, TMP.COLUMN3, TMP.COLUMN5, TMP.COLUMN8;
IF (NOT FOUND OR ln_LineNo IS NULL) THEN
IF (NOT FOUND OR ln_LineNo IS NULL) THEN
GROUP BY TMP.COLUMN1, TMP.COLUMN2, TMP.COLUMN3, TMP.COLUMN5, TMP.COLUMN8;
IF (NOT FOUND OR ln_LineNo IS NULL) THEN
IF (NOT FOUND OR ln_LineNo IS NULL) THEN
IF (CAST(lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN9 AS NUMERIC) > 1 AND ln_Count = 0) THEN
IF (ls_EOSType = '1' AND lrec_CSVUploadColumnData.COLUMN7 <> '2' AND CURRENT_DATE - '3 MONTH'::INTERVAL > lrec_OrderHeader.INSPECTDATE) THEN
GROUP BY T1.SYSDENPNO, T1.PARTNER_CD, T2.TAXTYPE, T2.TAXRATE
returntype						character varying(2) DEFAULT '00'::character varying NOT NULL,
pendingtype						character varying(1) DEFAULT '0'::character varying NOT NULL,
addoperator_cd					character varying(20) DEFAULT 'SYSTEM'::character varying NOT NULL,
adddatetime						timestamp(6) without time zone NOT NULL,
updoperator_cd					character varying(20) DEFAULT 'SYSTEM'::character varying NOT NULL,
upddatetime						timestamp(6) without time zone NOT NULL,
CREATE INDEX ix1_utrreturnheader ON utr_returnheader USING btree (denpno);
CREATE INDEX ix2_utrreturnheader ON utr_returnheader USING btree (store_cd);
CREATE INDEX ix3_utrreturnheader ON utr_returnheader USING btree (partner_cd);
CREATE INDEX ix4_utrreturnheader ON utr_returnheader USING btree (returndate, userdenptype);
logdatetime						timestamp without time zone not null,
returntype						character varying(2) DEFAULT '00'::character varying NOT NULL,
pendingtype						character varying(1) DEFAULT '0'::character varying NOT NULL,
addoperator_cd					character varying(20) DEFAULT 'SYSTEM'::character varying NOT NULL,
adddatetime						timestamp(6) without time zone NOT NULL,
updoperator_cd					character varying(20) DEFAULT 'SYSTEM'::character varying NOT NULL,
upddatetime						timestamp(6) without time zone NOT NULL,
CREATE INDEX ix1_utrreturnheaderlog ON utr_returnheaderlog (log_id, logdatetime);
CREATE INDEX ix2_utrreturnheaderlog ON utr_returnheaderlog (logdatetime, sysdenpno, logtype); -- Â§ñÈÉ®IF„ÉÅ„?º„É?Ë¶ÅÊúõ

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION pxs_utility.f_getpurchasegnkbik(i_qty numeric, i_partnergntnk numeric, i_denpkind character varying, i_denptype character varying, i_partner_cd character varying, i_store_cd character varying, i_sku_cd character varying, i_inspectdate date, i_denpinspectdate date, i_partnergnkforceflag boolean, i_orderdenpno numeric DEFAULT NULL::numeric, i_lineno numeric DEFAULT NULL::numeric, i_orderdate date DEFAULT NULL::date, i_inputwholesalegntnk numeric DEFAULT NULL::numeric, i_syscom00011_parentcompany_cd character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, i_syscomd0007_plangnktype character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, i_syscomd0022_tokubaibiktype character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, i_syscomd0023_housihinbiktype character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, i_syscom00201_purchaseclasstype character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, i_costroundtype character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, i_eosordergntnktype character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, i_tegordergntnktype character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, i_partnercompany_cd character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, i_company_cd character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, i_ordercompany_cd character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, i_gntnkselecttype character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, i_taxtype character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, i_tax_cd character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, i_taxrate numeric DEFAULT NULL::numeric, i_orderdetailgntnk numeric DEFAULT NULL::numeric, i_orderdetailbitnk numeric DEFAULT NULL::numeric, i_partner_rsvnum1 numeric DEFAULT '-1'::integer, i_orderdetailwholesalegntnk numeric DEFAULT NULL::numeric)

SELECT	COSTROUNDTYPE,		EOSORDERGNTNKTYPE,		TEGORDERGNTNKTYPE,		COMPANY_CD,				COALESCE(RSVNUM1, 0) -- ÈÅéÊ∏°ÊúüÂØæÂøú„Åß„ÄÅÊú™Ë®≠ÂÆöÊôÇ„ÅØ‰ºùÁ•®Êó•‰ªò„?ô„?º„Çπ„ÅßÁ®éÁéá„ÇíÂèñÂæó„Åô„Çã„Çà„Å?„Ä?0„É∂ÊúàÂâç„ÇíÊåáÂÆö„Ä?
INTO	ls_CostRoundType,	ls_EOSOrderGntnkType,	ls_TegOrderGnTnkType,	ls_PartnerCompany_Cd,	ln_Partner_RsvNum1
SELECT	GNTNK,					BITNK,					TAXTYPE,			TAX_CD,			WHOLESALEGNTNK,					PARTNER_CD
INTO	ln_OrderDetailGnTnk,	ln_OrderDetailBiTnk,	ls_OrderTaxType,	ls_OrderTax_Cd,	ln_OrderDetailWholeSaleGnTnk,	ls_OrderDetailPartner_Cd
SELECT	CASE WHEN ls_TaxType = '1' THEN ORDERGNTNK1		WHEN ls_TaxType IN ('2', '3') THEN ORDERGNTNK2		END,
CASE WHEN ls_TaxType = '1' THEN POSGNTNK1		WHEN ls_TaxType IN ('2', '3') THEN POSGNTNK2		END,
CASE WHEN ls_TaxType = '1' THEN WHOLESALEGNTNK1	WHEN ls_TaxType IN ('2', '3') THEN WHOLESALEGNTNK2	END,
CASE WHEN ls_TaxType = '1' THEN NET1GNTNK1		WHEN ls_TaxType IN ('2', '3') THEN NET1GNTNK2		END,
CASE WHEN ls_TaxType = '1' THEN NET2GNTNK1		WHEN ls_TaxType IN ('2', '3') THEN NET2GNTNK2		END,
CASE WHEN ls_TaxType = '1' THEN BITNK1			WHEN ls_TaxType IN ('2', '3') THEN BITNK2			END,
SELECT	CASE WHEN ls_TaxType = '1' THEN BITNK1			WHEN ls_TaxType IN ('2', '3') THEN BITNK2			END
CASE WHEN ls_TaxType = '1' THEN PSI.ORDERGNTNK1		WHEN ls_TaxType IN ('2', '3') THEN PSI.ORDERGNTNK2		END,
CASE WHEN ls_TaxType = '1' THEN PSI.POSGNTNK1		WHEN ls_TaxType IN ('2', '3') THEN PSI.POSGNTNK2		END,
CASE WHEN ls_TaxType = '1' THEN PSI.WHOLESALEGNTNK1	WHEN ls_TaxType IN ('2', '3') THEN PSI.WHOLESALEGNTNK2	END,
CASE WHEN ls_TaxType = '1' THEN PSI.NET1GNTNK1		WHEN ls_TaxType IN ('2', '3') THEN PSI.NET1GNTNK2		END,
CASE WHEN ls_TaxType = '1' THEN PSI.NET2GNTNK1		WHEN ls_TaxType IN ('2', '3') THEN PSI.NET2GNTNK2		END,
CASE WHEN ls_TaxType = '1' THEN PSI.BITNK1			WHEN ls_TaxType IN ('2', '3') THEN PSI.BITNK2			END,
AND		i_DenpInspectDate	BETWEEN PSI.DELIVERYSTARTDATE AND PSI.DELIVERYENDDATE
ORDER BY PSI.ORDERGNTNK_STFLG, PSI.ORDERGNTNK1, PSI.DELIVERYSTARTDATE DESC, PSI.ORDERENDDATE, PSI.PLAN_CD

IF (lb_IsMasterGntnkFromPlan AND ls_EosPosFlag = '0' AND ls_Bitnk_StFlg <> '1') THEN -- Â£≤‰æ°„ÅÇ„Çä„ÅÆ‰ºÅÁîª„ÅåÈÅ©Áî®„Åï„Çå„ÅüÂ?¥Âêà„ÄÅ„Ç∑„Çπ„Ç≥„É?„Å´„Çà„Çä‰ºÅÁîªÂ£≤‰æ°„Å®ÂÆöÁï™Â£≤‰æ°„ÅÆ„Å©„Å°„Çâ„Çí„Å®„Çã„Åã„ÇíÂà§Êñ≠„Åô„Çã„Ä?
SELECT	CASE WHEN ls_TaxType = '1' THEN QUOTEGNTNK1		WHEN ls_TaxType IN ('2', '3') THEN QUOTEGNTNK2		END,
CASE WHEN ls_TaxType = '1' THEN MAKERNETGNTNK1	WHEN ls_TaxType IN ('2', '3') THEN MAKERNETGNTNK2	END
IF (lb_NoMasterGnkFlag AND i_PartnerGntnk IS NOT NULL) THEN

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION pxs_utility.f_getpurchasegnkbik(i_qty numeric, i_partnergntnk numeric, i_mastergntnk numeric, i_orderdetailgntnk numeric, i_wholesalegntnk numeric, i_masterbitnk numeric, i_orderdetailbitnk numeric, i_denpkind character varying, i_denptype character varying, i_eosordergntnktype character varying, i_tegordergntnktype character varying, i_taxtype character varying, i_taxrate numeric, i_costroundtype character varying, i_gntnkselecttype character varying, i_syscom00011_parentcompany_cd character varying, i_ordercompany_cd character varying, i_partnercompany_cd character varying, i_iswholesalegntnkfromplan boolean, i_itemposgntnk numeric, i_itemnet1gntnk numeric, i_itemnet2gntnk numeric, i_plan_cd character varying, i_partnergnkforceflag boolean, i_nomastergnkflag boolean, i_itemwholesalegntnk numeric, i_itemmastergntnk numeric, i_planwholesalegntnk numeric, i_plannet1gntnk numeric, i_plannet2gntnk numeric, i_planmasterordergntnk numeric, i_planposgntnk numeric, i_quotegntnk numeric, i_makernetgntnk numeric, i_purchaseinfo1 character varying, i_orderdetailwholesalegntnk numeric)
